original_text: And he commanded the most mighty men that were in his army to bind Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, and to cast them into the burning fiery furnace.
korean_text: 군대 중 용사 몇 사람에게 명령하여 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 결박하여 극렬히 타는 풀무불 가운데에 던지라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And he commanded the most mighty men
to bind Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego
and to cast them into the burning fiery furnace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 뜨거운 타는 용광로에 던지도록
